scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Adoration of the Magi. The Virgin Mary, dressed in a blue mantle and green undergarment, holds the Christ Child on her lap. The Christ Child, with a golden halo, is reaching out. Three Magi are present. One, wearing a red turban and blue robe, offers a golden vessel. Another, kneeling and dressed in blue and pink, also offers a golden vessel. The third Magus, standing and adorned in a red robe and crown, touches his crown. The figures are set against a rich red background with intricate gold foliate decoration. A golden, box-like structure is visible beneath the Virgin and Child.
